channel.title: No attack in fight pits. [317] Delta
channel.description: Hello, I have searched google, and yes I have used the search bar on here too... Cannot find out how to add an option to 'attack' in fight pits. I mean when you get inside there is no option to attack. I got a 317 Delta Base, Please help...

item.title: No attack in fight pits. [317] Delta
item.dc:creator: @mod_xtomx mod xtomx
item.description:
@mod_xtomx wrote:

Add a basic fight cave fire cape minigame to Emulous/Riotscape bases using events.
That's not what Im aiming for, my server allready has a working firecape, fightcave minigame. I'm talking about Fight Pits, for player pvp minigame.

Read full topic
